titleStmt.title: An accurate description of the United Netherlands, and of the most considerable parts of Germany, Sweden, & Denmark containing a succinct account of what is most remarkable in these countries, and necessary instructions for travellers : together with an exact relation of the entertainment of His Most Sacred Majesty King William at the Hague / written by an English gentleman.
titleStmt.author: English gentleman.

titleStmt.title: An accurate description of the United Netherlands, and of the most considerable parts of Germany, Sweden, & Denmark containing a succinct account of what is most remarkable in these countries, and necessary instructions for travellers : together with an exact relation of the entertainment of His Most Sacred Majesty King William at the Hague / written by an English gentleman.
titleStmt.author: English gentleman.
Carr, William, 17th cent.

biblFull.extent: [4], 147, [2], 40 p., [4] leaves of folded plates : ill.

notesStmt.note: "An exact relation of the entertainment of His Most Sacred Majesty William III ... at the Hague" has special t.p. and separate paging.
Attributed to William Carr. Cf. Wing.
Entry for A438 cancelled in Wing (2nd ed.).
